_sText:
I've been mapping this map for quite awhile..although in a  beta majority of work is done.. I designed this map in genneral because I didnt see  a mall map at all in zm. There are custom texures, 2 secrects ..plenty of stores to hide in or either find some camping spot ... I plan to add more stores, and more zombie camping zones when I get enough feedback through the public
-----------------------
Credits to :
Renguard for his store contribue
GHS Clan for testing the map

If any problems such as missing textures please pm me..
I Pakrat all textures
-------------------------
Well thats about all right now
Have fun


-----------------------
Maybe in final verison I will add a seconod floor idk.if it will be good or not....
One more thing.. If you want to add a store to the mall I am willing to take anyone vmf as long as its reasonable
PM for dimesions and rules.
